title: Court Rejects Trump Bid to Block Records From House Jan. 6 Panel
sub_head: Former president claimed papers were privileged
body:
WASHINGTON—A federal appeals court rejected former President Donald Trump’s request to deny the special House committee investigating the Jan. 6 riot at the Capitol access to records from his presidency.
In a decision released Thursday, the federal appeals court in Washington declined to block the National Archives from turning over some of Mr. Trump’s papers sought by the House special committee. Mr. Trump had claimed the papers were privileged and asked a court to block their release.
